name: MEDCRUISE
goal: MedCruise mission is to promote the cruise industry in the Mediterranean, Black Sea, Adriatic Sea, Red Sea and Near Atlantic. Established in Rome in 1996, MedCruise membership spreads today in 21 countries and 3 different continents representing more than 130 ports and 30 cruise-related-companies and associations.

2.developing good relationship and cooperation among cruise ports and other cruise industry companies worldwide;
